pli-tv-pvr1.12:5.1: Methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanapaccayā āpattiyo sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ katihi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā?
pli-tv-pvr1.12:5.2: Methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanapaccayā āpattiyo sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ catūhi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā—
pli-tv-pvr1.12:5.3: siyā pārājikāpattikkhandhena, siyā thullaccayāpattikkhandhena, siyā pācittiyāpattikkhandhena, siyā dukkaṭāpattikkhandhena …
pli-tv-pvr1.12:6.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karaṇapaccayā āpatti sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ katihi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā?
pli-tv-pvr1.12:6.2: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karaṇapaccayā āpatti sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ ekena āpattikkhandhena saṅgahitā—
